title: [Voice] Partial order cancellation for FXN
description:
Description
  As a O3 Team
I would like to cancel partial FXN product orders
So that EOS users can cancel partial FXN product orders and Flamingo user can cancel total orders containing partial FXN orders
Current situation
Currently, EOS sends a PATCH request to o3 for the cancellation of FXN partial orders, which sets the status of the partial order to cancelled.
